languages.text: "Рыба гниет с головы, а тюрьма начинает рушиться из-за надзирателей. Подозрительно, что никто не может разобраться с проблемой: тряхните старший состав как следует — кто-то из тюремщиков наверняка использует ситуацию в личных целях".

traits.locale_text: "Рыба гниет с головы, а тюрьма начинает рушиться из-за надзирателей. Подозрительно, что никто не может разобраться с проблемой: тряхните старший состав как следует — кто-то из тюремщиков наверняка использует ситуацию в личных целях".

languages.text: "A fish rots from the head, and a prison begins to collapse because of its overseers. It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends."
languages.original_text: "Рыба гниет с головы, а тюрьма начинает рушиться из-за надзирателей. Подозрительно, что никто не может разобраться с проблемой: тряхните старший состав как следует — кто-то из тюремщиков наверняка использует ситуацию в личных целях".

It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends.

"A fish rots from the head, and a prison begins to collapse because of its overseers. It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends."

"A fish rots from the head, and a prison begins to collapse because of its overseers. It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends."

languages.text: "Balık baştan kokarmış. Hapishane, içindeki gözetmenlerin yediği haltlar yüzünden çöker. Kimsenin sorunun temeline inmemiş olması şüphe uyandırıcı. Gerekli bilgileri edinmek için kıdemli personelle konuşulması gerek. Hapishanedeki birileri, bu durumu kendi çıkarları için kullanıyor olmalı."
languages.original_text: "A fish rots from the head, and a prison begins to collapse because of its overseers. It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends."

traits.locale_text: "Balık baştan kokarmış. Hapishane, içindeki gözetmenlerin yediği haltlar yüzünden çöker. Kimsenin sorunun temeline inmemiş olması şüphe uyandırıcı. Gerekli bilgileri edinmek için kıdemli personelle konuşulması gerek. Hapishanedeki birileri, bu durumu kendi çıkarları için kullanıyor olmalı."

languages.text: « Comme un poisson qui pourrit d'abord par la tête, une prison commence à s'effondrer à cause de ses administrateurs. Il est étrange que personne n'ait réussi à résoudre ce problème : mettez les officiers supérieurs sur la sellette pour obtenir les informations dont nous avons besoin. Je soupçonne que l'un d'eux exploite la situation dans son propre intérêt. »
languages.original_text: "A fish rots from the head, and a prison begins to collapse because of its overseers. It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends."

traits.locale_text: « Comme un poisson qui pourrit d'abord par la tête, une prison commence à s'effondrer à cause de ses administrateurs. Il est étrange que personne n'ait réussi à résoudre ce problème : mettez les officiers supérieurs sur la sellette pour obtenir les informations dont nous avons besoin. Je soupçonne que l'un d'eux exploite la situation dans son propre intérêt. »

languages.text: 「魚は頭から腐るものであり、刑務所も監督者のせいで崩壊し始めています。問題の核心に誰もたどり着けていないのは怪しいです。必要な情報を得るために上層部に圧力をかけましょう。刑務所内の誰かがこの状況を利用して、自分の目的を果たしているに違いありません」
languages.original_text: "A fish rots from the head, and a prison begins to collapse because of its overseers. It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends."

traits.locale_text: 「魚は頭から腐るものであり、刑務所も監督者のせいで崩壊し始めています。問題の核心に誰もたどり着けていないのは怪しいです。必要な情報を得るために上層部に圧力をかけましょう。刑務所内の誰かがこの状況を利用して、自分の目的を果たしているに違いありません」

languages.text: “人坏在心，树烂在根。监狱要是出了问题，那监察员队伍肯定也出了问题。目前还没有人弄清楚事情的原委，这点很可疑。我们可以先审讯那些高阶监察员。肯定有人在浑水摸鱼，打算借这个机会实现不可告人的目的。”
languages.original_text: "A fish rots from the head, and a prison begins to collapse because of its overseers. It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends."

traits.locale_text: “人坏在心，树烂在根。监狱要是出了问题，那监察员队伍肯定也出了问题。目前还没有人弄清楚事情的原委，这点很可疑。我们可以先审讯那些高阶监察员。肯定有人在浑水摸鱼，打算借这个机会实现不可告人的目的。”

languages.text: «El pescado se pudre desde la cabeza y las prisiones se corrompen por sus supervisores. Es sospechoso que nadie haya llegado al fondo de la cuestión. Presione al personal de mayor rango para obtener la información que necesitamos. Alguien en la prisión está explotando la situación en beneficio propio».
languages.original_text: "A fish rots from the head, and a prison begins to collapse because of its overseers. It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends."

traits.locale_text: «El pescado se pudre desde la cabeza y las prisiones se corrompen por sus supervisores. Es sospechoso que nadie haya llegado al fondo de la cuestión. Presione al personal de mayor rango para obtener la información que necesitamos. Alguien en la prisión está explotando la situación en beneficio propio».

languages.text: "Ein Fisch stinkt vom Kopf, und ein Gefängnis kollabiert wegen seiner Aufseher. Es ist verdächtig, dass bisher niemand dem Problem auf den Grund gehen konnte: Wendet Euch an die Führungskräfte, um die Informationen zu erhalten, die wir brauchen ... irgendwer in dem Gefängnis muss die Situation zu seinen Gunsten nutzen."
languages.original_text: "A fish rots from the head, and a prison begins to collapse because of its overseers. It is suspicious that no one has managed to get to the bottom of the problem: lean on the senior staff to get the information we need — someone in the prison must be exploiting the situation for their own ends."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Fisch stinkt vom Kopf, und ein Gefängnis kollabiert wegen seiner Aufseher. Es ist verdächtig, dass bisher niemand dem Problem auf den Grund gehen konnte: Wendet Euch an die Führungskräfte, um die Informationen zu erhalten, die wir brauchen ... irgendwer in dem Gefängnis muss die Situation zu seinen Gunsten nutzen."
